placeholderImages.description: A person on a laptop with a shield icon overlay, representing digital security.
Close-up of a smartphone screen showing a fake package delivery notification.
An email inbox with a phishing email highlighted, showing a sense of urgency.
A person looking at a computer screen with a fake job offer.
A stock market chart on a screen with a person looking concerned, representing an investment scam.
A pop-up on a laptop screen claiming a virus has been detected.
